reviewText: Beautiful aerial view of the island.  Pleasant musical accompaniment.
enjoyed seeing all the different towns.
Only had the audio no image/picture. Very disappointed
As an Italian, I thought I knew most of the natural beauties of the country.  After watching this video I realized how much I didn't know!

I really enjoyed this DVD, it has wonderful video and aerial photography typical of the Visions series. I've been to Sicily, it is a beautiful island and this production does it justice. The only changes I would make: include the Greek temple of Segesta (an absolute must-see), and lose the American narrator, who sounds like Rick Steves (can't confirm, but not appealing). The voiceover on Visions Of Italy is a classy foreign woman, much more pleasant. Still, very enjoyable and highly recommended! I'm ready to return. As they say, "Conquer Sicily, everyone else has!"

Five Stars for the Visions DVD Series, including this Visions of Sicily program.

Minus 4 Stars for selling this DVD as if it was a standalone product for 2/3 the price of the Visions of Italy 2-Disc set which includes this title.
